remarks.format: ## Remarks 用來實作非同步批次的工作提交錯誤截取物件。 is used to implement error trapping on the asynchronous batch work that is submitted by the object. 傳遞的呼叫中的物件上實作這個介面上物件。Implement this interface on the object that is passed in the call to on the object. 決定在以非同步方式執行的批次工作中發生錯誤。 determines if an error occurred in batch work that is running asynchronously. 此介面可讓您在非同步批次工作中發生之錯誤的通知，程序即將終止 (failfast) 上無法復原的錯誤。This interface enables you to be informed of errors that occur in asynchronous batch work, and the process will terminate (failfast) on any unrecoverable error. span.span: Handles errors for asynchronous batch work.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法應該實作，正常處理批次工作以非同步方式執行時所發生的錯誤。This method should be implemented to gracefully handle errors that occur when batch work is running asynchronously. 在處理序終止 (failfast) 上無法復原的錯誤，因為這個方法沒有無從得知何時在非同步批次工作中發生錯誤。Because the process terminates (failfast) on any unrecoverable error, without this method there is no way of knowing when errors occur in asynchronous batch work. 這個方法會傳回錯誤當做其傳回值時，也會終止處理程序。The process also terminates when this method returns an error as its return value. 中實作本身的批次工作，及藉由呼叫以非同步方式執行。The batch work itself is implemented in , and it is run asynchronously by calling . 這個方法支援標準傳回值`E_FAIL`， `E_INVALIDARG`，和`E_OUTOFMEMORY`，以及`S_OK`，表示在方法呼叫成功傳回。This method supports the standard return values `E_FAIL`, `E_INVALIDARG`, and `E_OUTOFMEMORY`, as well as `S_OK`, which indicates the method call returned successfully.
